txt.en: The true nature of the Unhoused is too terrible even to contemplate. They stalk the Houses of Lamentation consumed by unending torment, a reminder of the dark arts and fiendish brutality of the Nazgûl and those who worshipped them.

Many lingering spirits haunt the Halls of Black Lore. Whether they are former servants of Dolguzigir, forever bound as he is, or creations of the many dark practices described in the tomes within, it is unclear the nature of their servitude.
Defeat many of the shades and fell spirits within the Halls of Black Lore.
Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore: Slayer of Spirits
Defeat many of the shades and fell spirits within the Halls of Black Lore
